DOC.brief_summary: General objective : To assess effectiveness treatment program specific cannabis abuse ( cognitive behavioral treatment + pharmacological treatment ) compare standard treatment ( pharmacological treatment + psychoeducation ) patient first episodes psychosis ( FEP ) cannabis user . Design A multicenter single-blind randomize study 1 year follow-up . The effectiveness treatment program specific cannabis abuse ( cognitive behavioral treatment + pharmacological treatment ) compare standard treatment ( pharmacological treatment + psychoeducation ) patient first episodes psychosis ( FEP ) cannabis user assess . Patients randomly assign one two treatment : 1 . Experimental group ( N=50 ) : Cognitive-behavioral treatment specific cannabis abuse + pharmacological treatment 2 . Control group ( N=50 ) : standard treatment : psychoeducation + pharmacological treatment
DOC.brief_title: COGNITIVE BEHAVIORAL THERAPY PROGRAM TO FIRST-EPISODE PSYCHOSIS PATIENTS AND CANNABIS ABUSE
DOC.criteria: 1 . Having first psychotic episode . DSMIVTR diagnosis psychotic disorder ( i.e . schizophrenia , schizophreniform disorder , schizoaffective disorder , delusional disorder , bipolar disorder , atypical psychosis , brief psychotic disorder , major depressive disorder psychotic symptom ) . 2 .
